item.title: Exfiltrating Data from MySQL and Postgres
item.description: I continued experimenting with Metasploitable 2. Over the past few days I managed to gain access to the MySQL and Postgres databases and used net cat to dump the databases and export them. Using a similar technique as before, I used a reverse shell exploit to control the host, I launched mysql, queried the database to view the users, and found that two users didn’t have passwords. I then used the guest account to dump the tables into a zip file and used net cat to send the file from the host over to my attacker.
